title: A Cup of Comfort For Christmas: Stories that celebrate the warmth, joy, and wonder of the holiday
description: The stories in this inspiring collection are joyous reminders of what the holidays are all about. Written by people just like you, these uplifting stories celebrate the true meaning of Christmas. You and your family will be thoroughly entertained by the celebrations, merriment, and revelations that fill these pages. You will immediately feel the holiday spirit as you share in the moving experiences featured in this volume, such as: There's no time like the holidays for the heartwarming stories found in A Cup of Comfort for Christmas !
author: Colleen Sell
